title: Textile, ca. 1825
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Fragment showing a pattern of a hunter with two dogs in a field of flowers with sheaves of wheat under a flowering tree. Colors are red, blue, yellow and dark brown on a light brown ground.
